Langwith firsts got off to an ideal start on Thursday, with a plucky 3-2 victory over Wentworth seconds at the JLD

Vanbrugh seconds held on to a 3-2 lead after an electric second half against James thirds to open their College Cup campaign with a win

UYAFC seconds had no luck as they were the better side, but found themselves on the wrong end of a 3-0 defeat at Roses

Derwent seconds got their College Cup campaign off to a perfect start on Tuesday, as they hammered Goodricke thirds 9-1 to go top of the league

A spirited Alcuin seconds side held Halifax firsts to an entertaining 1-1 draw on Tuesday's opening JLD fixture as the reigning champions Halifax encountered their first hiccup of the campaign.
